entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers near Zeballos and Tahsis this afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
